data.title: Dr. Krishnaveney
data.text:
Peer Reviewed Publications

conference proceedings

Published as full paper

Sankaras Advaita and Madhyamika Buddhism. A research paper presented at the seminar on “Hindu Religions and Avaidika Nerikulum” the Department of Hindu Religious and cultural Affairs, Colombo-14. 2013. published in 2014.

The Spiritual Life and the philosophy of Bhagavan Ramanarishi, presented in the Seminar on British Colonialism and Modernization in 2011, Published on 2012.

Tattuvarayar in Advaita Tradition, Presented in Seminar on The Vijaya Nagar Empire and the Hindu cultural Renaissance in 2009., 2010. Dept. of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs, Col.4.

Aesthetics of the Tamils, A study based on Grammatical Texts of the Cholas period Conducted by Department of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs, 2008. published in 2009.

“Bhakti Rasa Based on Bhakti Literature of Pallava Period”. Seminar on Bhakti Neriyum Panpattuk Kolankalum, conducted by Department of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs,July 29-june 1,2007. published in 2008.

“Artistic Expression in Sangam Literatures with Special Reference to Flora and Fauna” Paper presented at seminar on Sangam Literature and Society Organized by Dept. of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs, November 3-5, 2006. published in 2007.

Bhakti Rasa Expressed Through Periya Puranam, Fifth International Seminar on Sekkizhar, 2005,September,9,10,11. Dept.of of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs.

Theory in Hindu Tradition., The 2nd world Hindu conference conducted (May2nd -3rd 2003) and published by Dept.of of Hindu Religious and cultural Affairs. published in 2004.

Aesthetics of Silappatikaram, A paper presented at Seminar on Silappatikarap Panpattuk Kolankal 2002, and published by Dept.of of Hindu Religious and cultural Affairs, 2003.

Saiva Siddhanta Philosophy, a study based on Thirumanthiram. The Research seminar conducted by the Dept. of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs on 12th 13th of October 1997., published in 1998.

Published in Abstract form

Artistic Expressions of Sangam period based on Flora Fauna conducted by Dept.of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs, Colombo, 2006.

Aesthetics of Silappathikaram, A study based on Silappatikaram, conducted by Dept.of Hindu Religious and Cultural Affairs, 2002.

Invited Talks/ Lectures

Lecture on “The Concept of Taste in Indian and Western Aesthetics” at the programme of Ilakkiyak Kalam, in Tamil Sangam on August 2014.

‘Natiya Abhinayas in Art Experience’ in Residential Seminar, Awarding Ceremony of North Ceylon Oriental Music Society, Jaffna, 2011.

“South Indian Sculptural Doctrines and its practices in Jaffna,” Yalpana mozhiyum vazhvum, An introductory Hand Book, 2009.

Delivered lecture on “Tamil Aesthetics,” A Perspective.’ Arivor onrukudal, Tamil sangam. Colombo, 17. 01 2007.

Speech on “Spiritual Dharma and Woman,” Woman Day of Sathya Sayi Baba Samity November, Jaffna, 19, 2007.

Founder Member Speech on Art Society and Culture, Victoria College, Chulipuram, 2007.

Speech on “Status of Woman in Society,” Thellipalai Durgadevi Devasthanam, Silver Jubilee of Thondar Sabai, 2006.

Speech on “Service of the Women in Temple,” Thellipalai Durgadevi Devasthanam, Silver Jubilee of Thondar Sabai, 2005.

“Rasaanubavam –Brahmanubhavam Based on Santha, Bhakti Rasas A Study.” Sivaththamil selvi pavala vizha malar, Thellipalai Durgadevi Devasthanam, 07. 01. 2000.

“Vedas and Upanishades in Hindu Philosophical tradition” at Ramakrishna Mission, Colombo, 1999.
